001package org.nasdanika.graph.processor;
002
003import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME;
004
005import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
006import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
007import java.lang.annotation.Target;
008
009import org.nasdanika.graph.Connection;
010import org.nasdanika.graph.Node;
011
012/**
013 * Annotation for fields and methods returning an incoming handler for {@link Node} processors or incoming handler fields.
014 * Methods may be with zero parameters or with one parameter compatible with {@link Connection}. 
015 * @author Pavel
016 *
017 */
018@Retention(RUNTIME)
019@Target({ElementType.FIELD, ElementType.METHOD})
020public @interface IncomingHandler {
021        
022        /**
023         * If not blank, the value shall be a <a href="https://docs.spring.io/spring-framework/docs/5.3.22/reference/html/core.html#expressions">Spring boolean expression</a>
024         * which is evaluated in the context of the incoming connection. 
025         * @return
026         */
027        String value() default "";
028        
029        /**
030         * Matching priority. Defaults to 0. Higher priorities are matched before lower priorities.
031         * @return
032         */
033        int priority() default 0;
034}
